metas.name: Peaky Blinders
metas.description: Given your enjoyment of gritty crime dramas like 'Boardwalk Empire' and 'Snowfall,' this series about a notorious Birmingham gang in the aftermath of WWI offers a similar blend of historical setting, intense violence, and complex moral characters.

metas.name: Mindhunter
metas.description: Your appreciation for crime and mystery, evident in 'Mare of Easttown' and 'The Night Manager,' will resonate with the psychological depth and investigative realism of 'Mindhunter,' which delves into the early days of criminal profiling.

metas.name: The Sopranos
metas.description: As a fan of character-driven crime dramas like 'Boardwalk Empire,' you'll find 'The Sopranos' to be a seminal work, exploring the complex inner life of a mob boss with unparalleled emotional depth and dark humor.

metas.name: Ozark
metas.description: The high stakes and dark themes of your watched shows, particularly 'Snowfall' and 'Mare of Easttown,' are perfectly captured in 'Ozark,' a tense drama about a financial planner who must launder money for a Mexican drug cartel.

metas.name: Barry
metas.description: Your enjoyment of 'Inside No. 9' and its dark comedy elements suggests you'll appreciate 'Barry,' a show that masterfully blends assassin-thriller elements with poignant, often tragic, dark humor and character development.

metas.name: Chernobyl
metas.description: This historical drama, much like 'Boardwalk Empire' in its detailed depiction of a specific era and high stakes, is an intense and unflinching look at the catastrophic nuclear disaster, demanding attention with its gripping narrative and emotional weight.

metas.name: The Americans
metas.description: The blend of espionage, drama, and intense character work you enjoyed in 'The Night Manager' will appeal to 'The Americans,' a sophisticated thriller about Soviet sleeper agents in 1980s America.

metas.name: Westworld
metas.description: Your interest in complex narratives and sci-fi elements, seen in 'The Expanse' and 'Foundation,' will be rewarded by 'Westworld,' a philosophical and often violent exploration of artificial intelligence and consciousness.

metas.name: Dark
metas.description: For fans of intricate mysteries and dark, complex themes like in 'Inside No. 9' and 'The Apothecary Diaries,' 'Dark' is a German science fiction thriller that weaves a mind-bending narrative across multiple timelines.

metas.name: The Leftovers
metas.description: The emotional complexity and dark themes of shows like 'Mare of Easttown' and 'The Expanse' will find a profound match in 'The Leftovers,' a deeply philosophical and emotionally devastating drama about grief and faith.

metas.name: Yellowjackets
metas.description: Combining survival horror, mystery, and dark drama, 'Yellowjackets' offers the intense, high-stakes content you enjoy, similar to the complex plotting found in 'Mare of Easttown'.

metas.name: Mr. Robot
metas.description: If you appreciated the psychological complexity and dark undertones of 'Inside No. 9' and the crime elements of 'Snowfall,' 'Mr. Robot' is a must-watch for its brilliant exploration of hacking, mental illness, and societal critique.

metas.name: Severance
metas.description: The sci-fi mystery and dark themes present in 'The Expanse' and 'Love, Death & Robots' align with the unsettling premise and thought-provoking narrative of 'Severance,' a psychological thriller about work-life separation.

metas.name: The Wire
metas.description: As a fan of detailed crime dramas like 'Boardwalk Empire' and 'Snowfall,' 'The Wire' is an essential watch for its unflinching realism and intricate portrayal of the drug trade in Baltimore.

metas.name: Sharp Objects
metas.description: This psychological thriller, with its dark themes and mystery akin to 'Mare of Easttown,' follows a journalist investigating murders in her hometown, delving into her own troubled past.

metas.name: Killing Eve
metas.description: The cat-and-mouse dynamic and dark, witty undertones you might have enjoyed in 'The Night Manager' and 'Inside No. 9' are amplified in 'Killing Eve,' a stylish spy thriller with a compellingly twisted relationship at its core.

metas.name: Blue Lights
metas.description: Fans of gritty crime and high stakes like in 'Snowfall' and 'Mare of Easttown' will appreciate the realism and intensity of 'Blue Lights,' following rookie police officers in Belfast.

metas.name: Gomorrah
metas.description: Similar to the detailed crime narratives of 'Boardwalk Empire' and 'Snowfall,' this Italian series offers a stark and brutal look at the Neapolitan mafia, praised for its authenticity and dark realism.

metas.name: The Fall
metas.description: The psychological intensity and crime investigation elements you appreciated in 'Mare of Easttown' and 'The Night Manager' are central to 'The Fall,' a gripping drama about a detective hunting a serial killer.

metas.name: Fleabag
metas.description: Your enjoyment of 'Inside No. 9' and 'Barry' suggests an appreciation for dark comedy. 'Fleabag' offers a brilliantly sharp, witty, and emotionally complex portrayal of its protagonist's life, with moments of profound darkness.

metas.name: Bodyguard
metas.description: For those who appreciate high stakes and intense thrillers like 'The Night Manager,' 'Bodyguard' delivers a taut and suspenseful political drama with unexpected twists.

metas.name: Black Mirror
metas.description: Given your interest in 'Love, Death & Robots' and the unsettling nature of 'Inside No. 9,' this anthology series explores dystopian futures and the dark side of technology with compelling, often disturbing, narratives.

metas.name: Taboo
metas.description: The dark, atmospheric, and intense nature of 'Boardwalk Empire' and 'Snowfall' will draw you to 'Taboo,' a gritty historical drama with a darkly compelling performance from Tom Hardy.

metas.name: The Killing
metas.description: If you liked the slow-burn mystery and gritty crime of 'Mare of Easttown,' this Danish (or American remake) series offers a compelling and atmospheric murder investigation.

metas.name: Rectify
metas.description: For viewers who appreciate profound emotional complexity and dark themes as seen in 'The Leftovers' or 'Mare of Easttown,' 'Rectify' is a beautifully crafted drama about a man released from death row.

metas.name: Halt and Catch Fire
metas.description: While not overtly dark, this drama about the personal computer revolution offers intense character arcs and high stakes in a compelling, under-the-radar narrative, appealing to fans of intricate storytelling like 'The Expanse'.

metas.name: Deadwood
metas.description: Similar to 'Boardwalk Empire' in its historical setting and complex, morally ambiguous characters, 'Deadwood' is a gritty, dialogue-rich Western drama that doesn't shy away from violence or dark themes.

metas.name: Patriot
metas.description: This dark comedy spy thriller combines the bleakness and high stakes of espionage with absurdist humor, appealing to fans of shows like 'Barry' and the darker tones of 'Inside No. 9'.

metas.name: Alias Grace
metas.description: For those who enjoyed the historical mystery and psychological depth of 'Mare of Easttown' and 'The Night Manager,' this miniseries based on Margaret Atwood's novel offers a captivating look at a woman accused of murder.

metas.name: The Looming Tower
metas.description: The political intrigue and high stakes of 'The Night Manager' and the historical drama of 'Boardwalk Empire' are present in this series, which dramatizes the events leading up to the 9/11 attacks.

metas.name: Mr. Inbetween
metas.description: This Australian dark comedy-drama offers a raw and unflinching look at the life of a hitman, with a similar grounded realism and dark humor that fans of 'Barry' and 'Inside No. 9' might enjoy.

metas.name: True Detective
metas.description: The intense atmosphere, dark themes, and intricate crime mysteries of 'Mare of Easttown' and 'The Night Manager' are hallmarks of 'True Detective,' particularly its acclaimed first season.

metas.name: Babylon Berlin
metas.description: This visually stunning German crime drama set in Weimar Republic Berlin offers a rich historical backdrop, complex characters, and dark, often gritty, storylines that fans of 'Boardwalk Empire' will appreciate.

metas.name: Happy Valley
metas.description: If you enjoyed the gritty realism and intense drama of 'Mare of Easttown,' this British crime series provides a powerful and unflinching look at police work and the dark underbelly of a small town.

metas.name: The Knick
metas.description: From Steven Soderbergh, this medical drama set in a New York City hospital at the turn of the 20th century is praised for its intense atmosphere, dark themes, and complex characters, much like 'Boardwalk Empire'.

metas.name: Carnivàle
metas.description: For fans of dark, atmospheric, and complex narratives like 'The Expanse' or 'Love, Death & Robots,' this series set during the Great Depression blends supernatural elements with character-driven drama and a sense of foreboding.

metas.name: Raised by Wolves
metas.description: The blend of sci-fi, dark themes, and philosophical questions found in 'The Expanse' and 'Foundation' will appeal to 'Raised by Wolves,' a visually striking and thought-provoking series about androids raising human children on a mysterious planet.

metas.name: The Queen's Gambit
metas.description: This critically acclaimed drama about a chess prodigy offers intense emotional complexity and a compelling character journey, with dark undertones that fans of 'Mare of Easttown' might appreciate.

metas.name: Luther
metas.description: If you enjoy gritty crime procedurals with dark themes and a strong central performance, 'Luther' offers a tense and often disturbing look at a brilliant but troubled detective.

metas.name: Industry
metas.description: This series explores the high-stakes, morally ambiguous world of finance with a raw and intense energy, mirroring the complex power dynamics and dark themes found in shows like 'Succession' (which you've watched and enjoyed, assuming it was implied by the dark comedy example).
